definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: With flared arms and back, this sofa series gives off an aura of country yhic.
sentences.chinese: 微彎的靠手和椅背爲這系列沙發平添不少溫馨況味。

sentences.english: Yesterday evening, I almost felt the early Autumn approaching in Jiangnan.
sentences.chinese: 昨天黃昏，已經感受到江南初秋的況味。
